overview: Kunal is a serial-entrepreneur. He worked with IBM before founding his first company,TechUnified, in year 2000. He transformed the company from a pure services company to a banking and telecom product company and was instrumental in getting his company acquired by a public listed entity. Kunal is a graduate from Indian Institute of Technology, Kanpur. Improving healthcare infrastructure is his goal and he believes that without improving the access to Doctors and Hospitals, it will be very difficult to provide quality healthcare to people.
